recipe.name: Balsamic Onion Jam
recipe.ingredients: 907 grams (2 pounds) onions (28 grams) 2 tablespoons butter 1/2 teaspoon salt Add 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar

step.describe:
Peel the onions and cut in quarters.
Put the onions, butter, and salt in the mixing bowl.
Scrape down. Add the whip. Remove the measuring cup from the lid.
Add the balsamic vinegar. Add measuring cup.
